sy1: Sugar craving, Mucus increase, Frequent infections, Nausea, Vomiting, Blurred vision, Hunger, Dehydration, Weight loss or gain, Fatigue.
sy2: Excessive consumption of Kapha aggravating foods like yogurt, milk, jaggery, sugarcane, carbs, sedentary lifestyle, lack of physical activities and exercises, excess sleeping, genetic factors, stress, fear and long standing illness.
tr1: Ginger powder added to aloe gel stimulates digestion, regulates the sugar metabolism (regulates pancreas function), and dispells mucus.
tr2: Much like ginger powder, taken with aloe gel, it is particularly good for the pancreas and sugar metabolism.
tr3: In eight ounces of aloe gel, add Turmeric, Sandalwood, Gotu Kola, Coriander. In equal parts up to one ounce.
